Desc.entry: Holds various activities including parent and toddler group, disabled group, housebound group, ladies group, play school, bingo and art group. Events include Summer and Christmas fayres. Premises are available for hire (see separate entry). A registered charity.

Address.entry: Batemoor and Jordanthorpe Neighbourhood and Safety Forum

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 8
